lead_paragraph: The House is expected to pass a bill that will loosen the information that the industry must report to regulators about the nature of its investments.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and DANIELLE IVORY

headline.print_headline: Bill to Weaken Dodd-Frank’s Rules on Private Equity Nears House Vote
headline.main: Private Equity Tries to Chip Away at Dodd-Frank With House Bill

snippet: The House is expected to pass a bill that will loosen the information that the industry must report to regulators about the nature of its investments....
abstract: House is scheduled to vote on Investment Advisers Modernization Act of 2016, bill championed by private equity industry trade group American Investment Council; bill, which removes some of Dodd-Frank Act regulations for private equity funds, is expected to pass House, but faces strong opponents including White House.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
